name: CROWN CASTLE AND ITS AFFILIATES
sampleDescriptions: Communications infrastructure issues relating to broadband deployment, including spectrum policy, tower siting, fiber and small cell policies, section 6409, 5G and related FCC proceedings.
Issues related to SECTION 224 OF THE COMMUNICATIONS ACT OF 1934, AS AMENDED
Issues related to 5G and the deployment and siting of communications infrastructure - no specific legislation.
